The exception above was generated when you were interacting with the UI, not
during rebuild. Didn't you get a VM dump (a hs_err_pid<number>.log on a Sun VM)
in the current directory?

How did the crash happen? Any messages presented?

No evidence of a crash here. Please provide a Java core dump file if available.
I will forward this to the UI team to look at this widget disposed error. Can
you reproduce this?

This just looks like a simple problem with error handling in the preference 
dailog - I don't think there is anything for Core to do here.

Were you making this change using the project preferences or the main 
preferences? I am having trouble replicating this right now as I suspect it is 
the side effect of a bug that is currently fixed.

The bug occured while changing the main preferences
I got no hs_err_pid... file during this crash
Can't replicate in 3.1 M4. Please reopen if you have replicatable steps.
